content:
The Belgian Artificial Intelligence Week is here and we are happy to be part of it! :raising_hand:‍♂️

Do not miss @HolgerHoos and his keynote talk during the EUROPEAN AI DAY: Meet the European AI National Hubs and Networks Workshop on the Future of “AI made in Europe”.

🕐 Friday, March 19, 9:00 CET
👉 Register here: https://aiweek.ai4belgium.be/en/

The attendance is free!

#EuropeanAI #AI4belgium #AI4Good #AI4All

La semaine belge de l'intelligence artificielle - Belgian AI Week
L'évènement de l'Intelligence Artificielle à ne pas manquer. Une semaine durant laquelle l'IA sera traitée sous tous ses angles !
